resources.string: Are you sure exit the application？
Please allow "Ku Play" to install apps from unknown sources！
To access contacts from a local contact, you need to use the contact permission. Please turn to "setting -> permission" to allow the permission.
Use camera must read and write phone storage permission,turn to "setting -> permission" to allow the permission.
Open album needs to read phone storage permission,turn to "setting -> permission" to allow the permission.
Scanning the QR code must use the camera ,the camera can not work without the permission, please turn to "setting -> permission" to allow the camera permissions
The current app lacks the necessary permissions. \n\n Please click "Settings "- "Permissions "-To open the required permissions.
